ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He will say, 'Oh! If only I had prepared in advance for this life of mine!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He will say: "Alas the woe! Would that I had sent ahead something in my life."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He will say: “Would that I had sent ahead what would be of avail for this life of mine!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He will say, "Would that I had done some good deeds for this life".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He will say, “Alas – if only I had sent some good deeds ahead, during my lifetime!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He will say: "Alas! Would that I had sent forth for my life!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He shall say: O! would that I had sent before for (this) my life!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He shall say, 'O would that I had forwarded for my life!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He will say: Ah, would that I had sent before me (some provision) for my life!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He will say, "Oh, would that I had provided beforehand for my life!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He will say. 'would that I had sent before for this life of mine!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He will say, ‘Alas, had I sent ahead for my life [in the Hereafter]!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He will say: "Ah! Would that I had sent forth (good deeds) for (this) my (Future) Life!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He will say: "Alas! Would that I had sent forth (good deeds) for (this) my life!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He will say: 'Would that I had forwarded (good works) for my life!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He will say, “If only I had forwarded for my life.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He will say, "Oh, I wish I had sent ahead [some good] for my life."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [89:24] He will say, as he remembers: ‘O (yā is for calling attention to something) would that I had sent ahead, good deeds and faith, for my life!’, [for] a good [life] in the Hereafter, or [it means] ‘during my life’ in the world.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He will say: Ah, would that) wishing: if only (I had sent before me (some provision) for my life!) if only I have worked in my previous perishing life to this everlasting life.
